-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Conversions between hmatrix and vector-sized types
--   
--   Conversions between statically sized types in hmatrix and
--   vector-sized.
--   
--   See README on Github
--   <a>https://github.com/mstksg/hmatrix-vector-sized#readme</a>
@package hmatrix-vector-sized
@version 0.1.0.0

module Numeric.LinearAlgebra.Static.Vector
rVec :: KnownNat n => R n -> Vector n ℝ
vecR :: KnownNat n => Vector n ℝ -> R n
cVec :: KnownNat n => C n -> Vector n ℂ
vecC :: KnownNat n => Vector n ℂ -> C n
lRows :: (KnownNat m, KnownNat n) => L m n -> Vector m (R n)
rowsL :: (KnownNat m, KnownNat n) => Vector m (R n) -> L m n
lCols :: (KnownNat m, KnownNat n) => L m n -> Vector n (R m)
colsL :: (KnownNat m, KnownNat n) => Vector n (R m) -> L m n
